text: Drako Motors is an American company that makes luxury sports cars. It is based in San Jose, California. Drako Motors makes electric cars. == History == Drako Motors was started in 2013 by Dean Drako and Shiv Sikand. In 2015, the company announced a new system called DriveOS. This system helps the car move by controlling the wheels and power. == Vehicles == ===Drako GTE=== The Drako GTE is an electric sports car. Based on the Karma Revero GT It has four motors, one for each wheel. It can reach a top speed of 206 mph (332 km/h) and go from 0 to 60 mph (97 km/h) in under 3 seconds. The car is a full-size sedan that can carry four people. Only 25 of these cars were made in 2020, with a price of $1,250,000. ===Drako Dragon=== In 2022, Drako Motors introduced the Drako Dragon, which is an all-electric luxury SUV. It has 2,000 horsepower, it can reach speeds over 200 mph (322 km/h), and has a range of 420 miles on one charge. The Drako Dragon costs $290,000. == References == Category:Automobile brands Category:American automobile companies Category:Companies based in the San Francisco Bay Area
title: Drako Motors
